ASoC: ops: Fix bounds check for _sx controls

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.14.301 by commit 4a95a49f26308782b4056401989ecd7768fda8fa, it was introduced in version v4.14.265 by commit 4977491e4b3aad8567f57e2a9992d251410c1db3. For more details please see the references link.
